entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening and then to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
